description.name: monmonad
description.tagline: MON Monad Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto monad-mon Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept MON Monad directly on your website
Unique monad/mon receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your monad/mon wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
